title: Rainforest Escape with breakfast hamper
description: Experience the lush rainforest, quaint tea rooms and picturesque villages of the Dandenong Ranges with two nights at Monreale Cottages. Includes a breakfast hamper, a complimentary bottle of Yarra Valley wine and Lindt chocolates to enjoy by your Cottage’s wood fire.

title: Dandenong Ranges Retreat 50 Minutes from Melbourne with Daily Breakfast
description: Surrounded by bird-filled gardens and the sweeping beauty of Victoria’s Dandenong Ranges, Panorama Retreat & Resort offers the perfect place to kick back and feel the serenity. Positioned a little under an hour out of Melbourne, it makes for a superb weekend away - after days spent exploring the picturesque town of Kalorama and the surrounding ranges, retreat to laidback modern Australian plates at the Outlook Dining Room or enjoy fun-filled moments by the resort’s pool.
offer_address: 180 Olinda Creek Road, Kalorama, Victoria 3766, Australia
